content: SP2 Commencement Livestream will be available here . logo Academics ACADEMICS Master’s Programs Master of Social Work MS in Social Policy MSSP+DA MS in Nonprofit Leadership Certificate Programs and Specializations MSW Certificate Programs & Specializations MSSP Certificate Programs NPL Certificate Programs Doctoral Programs PhD in Social Welfare Doctorate in Clinical Social Work Interdisciplinary Partnerships MSW/Certificate in Jewish Communal Service NPL/Center for Social Impact Strategy Executive Program NPL/Certificate in Jewish Communal Service NPL/Certificate in Jewish Nonprofit Management NPL/MA in Hebrew Letters NPL/MA in Jewish Communal Service NPL/Master of Social Welfare Dual Degree Programs Submatriculation for Penn Undergraduates MSW Dual Degree Programs MSSP Dual Degree Programs NPL Dual Degree Programs Continuing Education: OpenSP2 Academics The world needs leaders equipped with tools to make a difference. The School of Social Policy & Practice (SP2) will prepare you to become one of those leaders, as a policy maker, practitioner, educator, activist, and more. Learn more about our degree programs, dual degrees, certificates and specializations, continuing education programs, and more. LEARN MORE Financial Aid Funding Your Education We will connect you with financial aid, scholarships, loans, work study programs, fellowships, and other resources that make an SP2 education accessible and affordable. LEARN MORE “Here at SP2, we are looking for critical thinkers committed to making impactful change in our world. Each year, I look forward to welcoming a new cohort of students knowing that they will be impacting societal change on many levels.” – Mary Mazzola , Associate Dean, Enrollment Management and Global Outreach Events 05/19 SP2 Jazz Brunch SP2 Jazz Brunch, May 19th: 12-2pm | Caster Courtyard – 3701 Locust Walk A crowd favorite, the SP2 Jazz Brunch is a great way to close out an exciting weekend […] MORE > Events 05/21 High Impact Philanthropy Academy Unlock the power of philanthropy with High Impact Philanthropy Academy, a certificate program for individual donors, professional grantmakers, and other philanthropic leaders seeking greater impact. Join our next cohort, beginning […] MORE > Events 06/01 MSW Licensure Seminar Final summary and ending MORE > Contact Us SP2 Admissions 215 746 1934 215 746 1300 (fax) apply@sp2.upenn.edu Office of Financial Aid 215 898 5535 finaid@sp2.upenn.edu Related Links ACADEMICS > REQUEST INFORMATION > ACCEPTED STUDENTS > ADMISSIONS STAFF > FINANCIAL AID STAFF > Footer DIRECTORY NEWS EVENTS POLICIES & PROCEDURES SP2 Academic Calendar EMPLOYMENT CONTACT US DISCLAIMER PRIVACY STATEMENT REPORT ACCESSIBILITY ISSUES/GET HELP ACCESS SP2 SHAREPOINT SCHOOL OF SOCIAL POLICY & PRACTICE 3701 Locust Walk Philadelphia, PA 19104-6214 PHONE: 215 898 5512 FAX: 215 573 2099 FOLLOW US pennsp2 View May 18 Open Yesterday, #PennSP2 celebrated five distinguished alumni at the 2024 SP2 Alumni Hall of Fame Induction Ceremony: Mery Diaz, DSW Daniel Jacobson López, MSW Matthew Miclette, MSSP Stephanie Rivera-Kumar, NPL Amy Blank Wilson, PhD The event marked the sixth year that the School has honored alumni through the SP2 Hall of Fame. 🏆 💙 Read more about our inductees at the link in bio. ... pennsp2 View May 17 Open We can`t wait to celebrate the #PennSP2 Class of 2024 this weekend! View all commencement and livestream details at the link in bio 🎓✨ #PennGrad ... pennsp2 View May 16 Open @UPenn_MSSP student Araí Yegros is the winner of #PennSP2`s Class of 2024 T-shirt Design Contest! 🏆 🎓 👕To purchase a shirt, visit the link in bio or stop by SP2`s Alumni Reception this Friday from 5:30 - 8 PM. T-shirt sales support SP2`s Class Gift campaign, an annual student-focused fundraising effort for the SP2 Annual Fund. #PennGrad #Classof2024 [Image Description: SP2 student Araí Yegros wearing the Class of 2024 t-shirt in front of the Caster building.] ...
